alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, southern Henry, southeastern Coffee, northeastern Geneva and northwestern Houston Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Enterprise to near Newton to Dothan. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Headland, Dothan, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Level Plains, Newton, Webb, New Brockton, Ariton, Pinckard, Rehobeth, Clayhatchee, Grimes and Newville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
